answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Katherine – I hope the following is helpful:
REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS FOR CONSULTANT SERVICES SUPPORTING A REGIONAL SUSTAINABILITY PLAN
 FOR THE TOLEDO-LUCAS COUNTY REGION
http://www.co.lucas.oh.us/documents/119/Toledo-Lucas%20County%20Sustainability%20Plan%20RFQ.pdf 
RFP 2391 - Cleaner, Greener Communities Regional Sustainability Planning Program 
http://www.nyserda.ny.gov/Funding-Opportunities/Current-Funding-Opportunities/RFP-2391-Cleaner-Greener-Communities-Regional-Sustainability-Planning-Program.aspx 
RFP for Environmental Sustainability Plan issued
http://www.springsgov.com/news.aspx?newsid=262 
Sustainable Cities Institute - Environmental Sustainability Plan Checklist
http://www.sustainablecitiesinstitute.org/view/page.basic/checklist/feature.checklist/Outline_Sustainability_Plan_Cklist 
Baltimore Sustainability Plan
http://www.dooconsulting.net/pdf/ref_bar/about/051509_BCS-001SustainabilityReport.pdf
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

author: Katherine Takai
text: Has anyone used a consultant or contracted out services related to developing a Sustainability Plan?  I'm looking for examples of RFP/RFQs for a Sustainable Development Plan or Community Sustainability Plan (CSP).  Any samples would be very helpful!
title: Sample Sustainability Plan RFP/RFQs?
